article_title: How "Death Spiral" Became a Widespread Term
article_text:
As the health-care exchanges under the Affordable Care Act opened for business this week, industry insiders warned of a looming threat.

"The danger if you don't get young healthy people signing up or if you don't get healthy people generally signing up is that this program will collapse," Robert Laszewski, president of Health Policy and Strategy Associates, told NPR's "Planet Money." "We actually have a term...

twitter.description: Phrase that started in aviation has a second life in finance, government and other areas.
twitter.title: How 'Death Spiral' Became a Widespread Term

image.alt: How the phrase 'death spiral' went up, up and away.
